description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, where you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Lightning Shoot" mini-game!
It's the climax of the match! A perfect free kick opportunity to aim for the goal! If you score this, victory is assured!
The target? Right at the corner of the goalpost! Can you elegantly score without anyone touching it!?
Now, kicker, steady your breath, pick your direction, and let's go, shoot!!
name: Additional mini-game "Lightning Shoot"
